Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

Are there any rover + oxygen + energy mods out there? I can't find anything. Also I need help in installing them. And a easy way on uninstalling them. Please I want some mods to play with. but easily uninstall them later...
This doesn't help you, but are there any good weapons mods compatible with .16? too?

This doesn't help you, but are there any good weapons mods compatible with .16? too?

I don't really need help, all I want is to try out some mods like the rovers and oxygene packs etc
Zoxygene for oxygen, EPS/Powersat/Dynasat has some good power applications, and Lionhead Aerospace has a good rover called the prometheus. Hope this helps!
As for rovers and weapons -- [thread=7854]Cart[/thread] and [thread=6014]Laser[/thread] both work in 0.16.
